title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook the chicken until it's done

title: Beef Stew
instructions: Cook the beef until it's done

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente\nCook the minced beef until browned\nAdd tomato sauce and simmer

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter the bread slices\nPlace cheese between slices\nGrill until golden brown

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Chop the vegetables\nStir fry in a hot pan with oil\nAdd soy sauce and stir

title: Tomato Soup
instructions: Chop the tomatoes\nCook in a pot with broth\nBlend until smooth

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook the chicken pieces\nAdd curry powder and coconut milk\nSimmer until thickened

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook the beef with taco seasoning\nFill tortillas with beef and toppings\nServe with salsa
